General.Name: Eclat Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Eclat Textile Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, process, sells, and markets clothing, knitted fabrics, garments, and textile raw materials in the Taiwan and internationally. The company operates in two Fabrics Division and Garments Division. It also operates in printing, dyeing, and finishing mill; and offers yarns, chemical synthetic fibers and silks, etc. In addition, it provides the wholesale of drugs and medical goods; retail sale of medical equipment; medical materials and equipment manufacturing; and invests in securities, real estate, and manufacturing industries. Eclat Textile Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 28, Wuquan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 248
